text: The is a dam on the Kodomari River, located in the town of Nakadomari, Kitatsugaru District, Aomori Prefecture in the Tohoku region of Japan. The dam is a concrete gravity dam across the Kodomari River. It is multipurpose dam to provide water for irrigation, flood control and drinking water. ==External links== *Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism Category:Dams in Aomori Prefecture Category:Dams completed in 1996 Category:Nakadomari, Aomori
title: Kodomari Dam
